task_prefix: Image Segmentation dataset. Contains features extracted from 3x3 pixel regions of 7 outdoor images that were hand-segmented to create pixel classifications. Used for training algorithms to segment images into different regions. Each example contains 19 features. Image segmentation.

column_descriptions.region-centroid-col: Column of the center pixel of the region
column_descriptions.region-centroid-row: Row of the center pixel of the region
column_descriptions.region-pixel-count: Number of pixels in a region (always 9 for 3x3)
column_descriptions.short-line-density-5: Line extraction result for low contrast lines of length 5
column_descriptions.short-line-density-2: Line extraction result for high contrast lines
column_descriptions.vedge-mean: Mean of contrast of horizontally adjacent pixels (vertical edge)
column_descriptions.vedge-sd: Standard deviation of vertical edge contrast
column_descriptions.hedge-mean: Mean of contrast of vertically adjacent pixels (horizontal edge)
column_descriptions.hedge-sd: Standard deviation of horizontal edge contrast
column_descriptions.rawred-mean: Mean of red channel over the region
column_descriptions.rawblue-mean: Mean of blue channel over the region
column_descriptions.rawgreen-mean: Mean of green channel over the region
column_descriptions.exred-mean: Mean of (2R - (G + B)) measure of excess red
column_descriptions.exblue-mean: Mean of (2B - (G + R)) measure of excess blue
column_descriptions.exgreen-mean: Mean of (2G - (R + B)) measure of excess green
column_descriptions.value-mean: Mean of value (from HSV color space)
column_descriptions.saturation-mean: Mean of saturation (from HSV color space)
column_descriptions.hue-mean: Mean of hue (from HSV color space)

class_description: Classes: 'brickface' (Brick face regions), 'sky' (Sky regions), 'foliage' (Trees, bushes, and other vegetation), 'cement' (Cement and concrete regions), 'window' (Window regions), 'path' (Path and road regions), 'grass' (Grass regions)
